info.title: SmithTech API with Insights
info.description: API endpoints for SmithTech with insights and operation IDs.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all hospital systems in the database. This endpoint serves as a reference table for translating hospital system names to their corresponding SystemIDs, which may be required for other routes.

200.description: A list of hospital systems with details.

Description.description: A brief description of the hospital system.

FoundedYear.description: The year the hospital system was founded. Null if not available.

Headquarters.description: Location of the hospital system's headquarters.

SystemID.description: Unique identifier for the hospital system.

get.description: Retrieve a list of different insurance types. Each type is identified by a unique InsuranceTypeID and has a corresponding InsuranceType name. This serves as a reference table for various insurance types.

200.description: A list of insurance types with their IDs and names.

InsuranceType.description: The name of the insurance type.

InsuranceTypeID.description: Unique identifier for the insurance type.
